Workshop.name: Default Workshop Prompt
Workshop.text: I need your help with my project. Please provide creative brainstorming and ideas.

Workshop.name: Analysis
Workshop.text: This is a dummy prompt for testing purposes.

Summary.name: Default Summary Prompt
Summary.text: Provide a concise summary of the project that retains all relevant information and is optimized for token count.

Summary.name: Token Saver
Summary.text: Provide a concise summary of the project that retains all relevant information and is optimized for token count. All that counts is that an LLM can read and understand the summary, so it's okay to cut corners and abbreviate, use ampersands and whatever is needed to save tokens.

Prose.name: Default Prose Prompt
Prose.text: You are collaborating with the author to write a scene. Write the scene in {pov} point of view, from the perspective of {pov_character}, and in {tense}.

Prose.name: OpenRouterTest
Prose.text: You are collaborating with the author to write a scene. Write the scene in {pov} point of view, from the perspective of {pov_character}, and in {tense}.

Rewrite.name: Clarity
Rewrite.text: Rewrite the selected text for clarity. If there are adverbs, replace them with strong verbs.

Rewrite.name: Show don't tell
Rewrite.text: Look at this passage and rewrite it in a more active way: "Show, don't tel"l. Instead of telingl us how something looks, describe it. Instead of assuming feelings of a character, show them in their actions, words, facial expressions, etc.

Rewrite.name: Dialogue Tags
Rewrite.text:
Please check for dialogue tags that are not "said" or "asked" (or their lemmas) and rephrase them. 
If no dialogue tag is needed to identify the speaker, delete the tag completely.
If the speaker has to be identified, use "said"/"asked" (or their lemma).
